mapper.insert: INSERT INTO child (child_id, child_name, child_date, child_sex, parent_id, classroom_id, kindergarten_id) VALUES (child_seq.NEXTVAL, #{childName}, #{childDate}, #{childSex}, #{parentId}, #{classroomId}, #{kindergartenId})
mapper.select: SELECT child_id as "childId", child_name as "childName", child_date as "childDate", child_sex as "childSex", parent_id as "parentId", classroom_id as "classroomId", kindergarten_id as "kindergartenId" FROM child WHERE parent_id = (SELECT parent_id FROM parent WHERE parent_email = #{parentEmail}) AND rownum = 1 ORDER BY child_id
